title: Judge Stops National Guard in Los Angeles
summary: A federal judge in California said the Trump administration must stop sending National Guard troops to Los Angeles. The judge, Charles Breyer, explained that the government needs checks and balances to work fairly. Also, in New York, another judge allowed secret papers from the Jeffrey Epstein case to be opened because of a new law. In Florida, Eileen Higgins won the election to be mayor of Miami. She is the first Democrat and first woman to be mayor there in nearly 30 years. Higgins talked about helping immigrants and making people feel safe instead of scared.

keywords.explanation: a person in court who makes decisions about the law
a group of soldiers who help during emergencies in the United States
a man involved in a bad case about hurting people
a vote where people choose their leaders
people who move to a new country to live

questions.question: Who ordered the stop to National Guard deployment?
Where did the judge make this order?
Why did the judge say the government should stop?
What was allowed to be opened in New York?
options: Secret papers from the Epstein case
questions.correct_answer: Secret papers from the Epstein case

questions.question: Who won the mayoral election in Miami?
What did Higgins say about immigrants?
options: She wants to help them feel safe
She wants to send them away
questions.correct_answer: She wants to help them feel safe

background_read: The National Guard is part of the military that can be called to help in disasters or other problems. Judges are important because they make sure laws are followed fairly. Elections let people vote for leaders like mayors. Immigrants are people who come to live in a new country, and they contribute to cities like Miami. This news shows how courts and elections affect our communities.
Article_Structure: WHAT: Ordered the Trump administration to stop National Guard deployment
WHY: To ensure checks and balances in government

perspectives.description: The judge believes the government should have limits to prevent abuse of power.
The new mayor wants to support immigrants and reduce fear in the community.
